UData\Widgets
namespace
UData\Widgets
UData\Widgets\UIScript

Creates a widget representing an HTML script element

Information
Extends

UData\Widgets\StdBase

Options

This widget accepts the following non-standard options: string src - Is an optional source attribute value.  This widget accepts all standard options.
